pages.title: Smelting Knowledge
pages.text: If you want the knowledge to $(l:sim_1/4_smeltery)Smelt$() things you're going to have to work for it.$(br2)Use your $(l:portal_hub/6_hook)Hook$() to climb one of the sky islands we have placed around this $(item)Simulation$().$(br2)If you lost your $(l:portal_hub/6_hook)Hook$() you are on your own, but I bet you can figure something out.

This knowledge is required before you can make a $(l:sim_1/4_smeltery)Smeltery$() and start smelting $(item)Metals$().$(br2)This magic $(l:http://tinkers-construct.wikia.com/wiki/Smeltery)Link$() will tell you everything you need to know about setting up a $(l:sim_1/4_smeltery)Smeltery$().
